title: No Wandb logging
body:
### Search before asking

- [x] I have searched the RF-DETR issues and found no similar bug report.


### Bug

- pip install "rfdetr[metrics]"
- wandb login -> success
- Ensure the PROJECT is created on wandb

```python
PROJECT = "my_project"

model.train(
    dataset_dir=dataset.location, 
    epochs=15, 
    batch_size=4, 
    grad_accum_steps=4, 
    lr=1e-4,
    wandb=True,
    output_dir=output_dir,
    project=PROJECT,
    run="some_name",
)
```
No errors, but no logs on wandb

### Environment

- rfdetr==1.0.8
- wandb==0.19.9

### Minimal Reproducible Example

see above

### Additional

_No response_

### Are you willing to submit a PR?

- [ ] Yes, I'd like to help by submitting a PR!
author: robmarkcole

comments.body: Your RF-DETR package is outdated. Please use 1.1.0.

OK resolved with 1.1.0.
Strange I got 1.0.8 as I pip installed yesterday
Thanks!

satisfaction_conditions: A solution that enables Wandb logging functionality to work properly
Information about using the correct version of the RF-DETR package
Clear guidance on how to resolve the issue without requiring code changes to their implementation

_classification.category: Can be dockerized without any issue
